body.name: Nature's Answer PerioWash Mouthwash Alcohol-Free Cool Mint - 16 fl oz | Fluoride Free | Natural Breath Freshener | Stain Remover | Natural Teeth Whitener (Pack of 1)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 19 - 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash Alcohol Free Cool Mint Formulated by a Dentist, Nature’s Answer PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash does more than keep breath fresh and clean, it promotes periodontal health, which is important for a healthy mouth.* In fact, daily cleansing and rinsing with PerioBrite helps promote healthy teeth and gums without the concerns about fluoride, because it’s fluoride free.*

Only PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash contains a unique combination of soothing organic wildcrafted herbs, well-known for their cleansing action, together with Co-Q10, Folic Acid, Oregano, Cinnamon and Clove to support tissue and gum health.*

Naturally moistens gum tissue for long-lasting results when used as part of an oral health program.* And since PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash is all natural and alcohol free it fights bad breath and relieves dry mouth naturally, energizing your mouth with a cool, sparkling minty-fresh feeling.*

Nature’s Answer Unique Bio-Chelation process. Only Nature’s Answer uses a unique Bio-Chelation process, developed by the company’s founder and owner. It includes “cold extraction.” Cold extraction, allows the raw plant materials to be extracted without being exposed to heat, capturing and preserving the holistic balance of the herbs in Nature’s Answer PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash

Nature’s Answer can compare and analyze the quality and purity of every incoming botanical used to formulate their products, assuring you that the wildcrafted herbs, Oregano, Cinnamon and Clove in Nature’s Answer PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash are the purest, highest-quality botanical ingredients.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Perio Brite Charcoal Toothpaste Only PerioBrite Natural Mouthwash contains a unique combination of soothing organic wildcrafted herbs, well-known for their cleansing action, together with Co-Q10, Folic Acid, Oregano, Cinnamon and Clove to support tissue and gum health.* It naturally moistens gum tissue for long-lasting results when used as part of an oral health program.*(FDA Disclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease). Patented Phytoplenolin Dentist formulated PerioBrite Natural Brightening Toothpaste contains Phytoplenolin, a patented herbal extract that has been shown in independent laboratory studies to promote cell vitality. Soothing wildcrafted herbs, well-known for their cleansing action, are combined with CoQ10, Folic Acid, Oregano, Cinnamon and Clove to promote tissue and gum wellness. Smile Naturally These supplements offer the ideal way to experience the benefits of high quality Standardized herbs. NO ARTIFICIAL FLAVORS, sweeteners, or preservatives. Gluten-Free. Fluoride-Free. Soy-Free. SLS-free.

Family Owned and Operated for Over 4 Decades From humble beginnings back in 1972 to our modern state-of-the-art facility, Nature’s Answer has evolved into one of today’s largest family-owned and operated manufacturers of high-quality nutritional products. The Genius of Mother Nature in Every Product Our state of the art laboratory equipment has identified each and every plant’s distinctive botanical fingerprint, which we then use as our baseline to analyze the quality and purity of every incoming botanical used to manufacture our products. The Nature's Answer Concentrated True Herbal Extract Difference Our extracts are made to the highest quality standard, and we verify what is in every bottle. Before our extracts are released to you, the consumer, they go through over 60 quality control checks by our Quality Control team, holding each extract to stringent standards. Our herbal formulas stand the test of time - over four decades of proven performance. Our vertically integrated manufacturing process allows us to have complete traceability from plant to shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive gums and this mouthwash is really soothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouthwash will by more when this bottle is empty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is an awesome product that really works!
reviews.reviewText: I have used this for over 2 years and see the difference in teeth and gums, plus I love the taste!I also like that it is all natural too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good flavor and leaves a clean fresh feeling in the mouth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars think it is working!
reviews.reviewText: I got this and the corresponding toothpaste because it has a lot of natural ingredients known to help with dental disease. NIH has a study regarding some of them, including especially coq10. I have a very, very loose tooth, and after using this about a month, it isn't as loose as it was, and my gums have returned to pink vs. pale. I think I will order more of this! It is a bit spendy, but how much does a tooth removal cost in comparison?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this for 2 years! I like the taste and it does a great job!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Took away tooth ache
reviews.reviewText: It does wonders and helped with my tooth ache temporarily until I went to the dentist

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I always use this mouthwash it’s the best

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Prefer this all natural to the usual harmful mouthwashes
reviews.reviewText: I dilute this as if used neat can burn or if you have gum disease etc best to dilute until under control. Otherwise the taste is great and all the ingredients are highly recommended. The usual chemical mouthwashes kill the good mouth microbiome, I use this to help re-establish a healthy mouth environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Scam! i was only sent one bottle. 4 of the bottles were missing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 6, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Not as good as the original product called Periowash, but still okay overall. Does taste more 'synthetic', but still seems to do a reasonable job in preventing gum inflammation after implants..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Only one bottle arrived out of five. 😩 This is the second time this has happened. 😫
